price: (61) Blessed is He who has placed in the sky great stars and placed therein a [burning] lamp and luminous moon.
arabic: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجٗا وَجَعَلَ فِيهَا سِرَٰجٗا وَقَمَرٗا مُّنِيرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: tabāraka alladhī jaʿala fī al-samāi burūjan wajaʿala fīhā sirājan waqamaran munīran
